events.message: I am filing a claim due to a car collision that occurred yesterday on Main Street, causing significant damage to my vehicle.
The claim has been assigned to the category 'Auto Accident' based on the details of the reported vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to oversee your car accident claim and will guide you through the next steps.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the automobile accident and have initiated the processing accordingly.
Please submit photos of your damaged vehicle, police report, and any repair estimates to support your auto accident claim.
The requested documents including police report and damage photos were submitted successfully for your car accident claim.
Our claims team has begun the investigation into the details and circumstances surrounding your vehicle collision.
Investigation has been completed confirming the accident details and validating the submitted evidence for your claim.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the repair costs and policy coverage for your auto accident claim.
You have confirmed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciate the quick handling of your vehicle damage claim.
Your claim has been approved and is now ready for the final payment to cover the damages from the auto accident.
We have issued the payment to cover the repair costs of your vehicle following the approval of your auto accident claim.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed. Please contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
